componentType.description: cursor position control via angular direction

outputPort.description: the current x-position of the angular arrow (use it e.g. to move the mouse)
the current y-position of the angular arrow (use it e.g. to move the mouse)

eventListenerPort.description: enables the functionality of this plugin
disables all functionality of this plugin
starts automatic movement backward, accelerated by propery acceleration
starts automatic movement forward, accelerated by propery acceleration
starts automatic angle rotation to the left (counterclockwise), accelerated by propery accelerationAngle
starts automatic angle rotation to the right (clockwise), accelerated by propery accelerationAngle
stops automatic angle rotation to the left (counterclockwise)
stops automatic angle rotation to the right (clockwise)

property.name: enabled
property.description: if true, the plugin is enabled, if false the plugin does nothing

property.name: absoluteAngle
property.description: if true, angle input port values are absolute values, else changes of current angle

property.name: wrapAround
property.description: if true, movement continues on other side of the screen, if screen end reached

property.name: clickEventTime
property.description: if not zero, a click indicator is shown and the click event is created after n millseconds inactivity

property.name: acceleration
property.description: cursor movement acceleration in px/second per second (0 to deactive acceleration)

property.name: baseVelocity
property.description: base movement velocity in px per second

property.name: maxVelocity
property.description: maximum mouse movement velocity in px per second

property.name: accelerationAngle
property.description: angle movement acceleration in degrees/second per second (0 to deactive acceleration)

property.name: baseVelocityAngle
property.description: base angle movement velocity in degrees per second

property.name: maxVelocityAngle
property.description: maximum angle movement velocity in degrees per second
